properties.name: KeyArn
properties.description: The ARN for a KMS key that is used to encrypt studio data.

type.description: The ARN for a KMS key that is used to encrypt studio data.

resource.description: Represents a streaming session machine image that can be used to launch a streaming session

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A human-readable description of the streaming image.

type.description: A human-readable description of the streaming image.

properties.name: Ec2ImageId
properties.description: The ID of an EC2 machine image with which to create this streaming image.

type.description: The ID of an EC2 machine image with which to create this streaming image.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: A friendly name for a streaming image resource.

type.description: A friendly name for a streaming image resource.

attributes.description: Represents a streaming session machine image that can be used to launch a streaming session

properties.name: EulaIds
properties.description: The list of EULAs that must be accepted before a Streaming Session can be started using this streaming image.

type.description: The list of EULAs that must be accepted before a Streaming Session can be started using this streaming image.

properties.name: Owner
properties.description: The owner of the streaming image, either the studioId that contains the streaming image, or 'amazon' for images that are provided by Amazon Nimble Studio.

type.description: The owner of the streaming image, either the studioId that contains the streaming image, or 'amazon' for images that are provided by Amazon Nimble Studio.

properties.name: Platform
properties.description: The platform of the streaming image, either WINDOWS or LINUX.

type.description: The platform of the streaming image, either WINDOWS or LINUX.
